import React, { Component } from 'react' import {FaStar} from 'react-icons/fa' import '../ratings.css' export class Ratings extends Component { state = { loading: true, offers: [] }; async componentDidMount(){ const url = "http://substyleprod.com/projects/APIS/ratings.json"; const response = await fetch(url); const data = await response.json(); console.log(data.length) this.setState({ratings: data, loading: false}) } render() { if (this.state.loading) { return
...loading reviews...please wait....
} if(!this.state.ratings.length) { return
No one's commenting! Be the first!
} return (

Ratings

User Rating

4.1 average based on {this.state.ratings.length} reviews.

5 star
150
4 star
63
3 star
15
2 star
6
1 star
20

Average {this.state.ratings.rating.average}

{this.state.ratings.length} written reviews

<> {this.state.ratings.map(rating => (
{rating.header}

{rating.comment}

{rating.name} - {rating.date}

))}
) } } export default Ratings
